messages.message:
:bug_red: [BUG ?] UI keeps loading for a random non-existant path with “/” in the end

https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/UX-76?atlOrigin=eyJpIjoiZGNlNWIyNDFiZjkyNDFhMDg1NWY3ZmQyMmI5NDcyZjEiLCJwIjoiaiJ9

cc: @Eric Han @Jessica
I remember talking with @dlluncor about this and he dug into some code and found that there was a reason we needed to catch it in the front end - @Mohit can you make a plex ticket with this info?
From what I remember, we have some deep down JS code which doesn’t propogate those errors to the onFail / onError handlers to its callers
